title: KHR_materials_clearcoat_ior glTF Material Extension
description: glTF extension that defines the index of refraction of the clearcoat layer.

clearcoatIor.description: The index of refraction of the clearcoat layer.
clearcoatIor.gltf_detailedDescription: The index of refraction (IOR) of the clearcoat layer is a measured physical number usually in the range between 1 and 2 that determines how much the path of light is bent, or refracted, when entering the clearcoat material. It also influences the ratio between reflected and transmitted light in the clearcoat layer, calculated from the Fresnel equations.
